definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: Such as municipal works in public places on the sun roof .
sentences.chinese: 如市政工程上的公共场所的阳光顶棚。

sentences.english: For example, acoustical tile on a ceiling serves to reduce the propagation of sound.
sentences.chinese: 比如，顶棚上安装吸音板就有助于减少声音的传播。

sentences.english: So, what they do is, the first time they might scratch at the bars, push at the ceiling, dig at the floor, howl, etc.
sentences.chinese: 起初小猫可能会抓栏杆，推顶棚，挖底板，吼叫等等。

sentences.english: On the ceilings are plates and saucers of the Chenghua Period of Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 顶棚中间镶嵌的是大明成化年间的盘子和碟子。

sentences.english: Used for building wall and ceiling adornment inside surface of prefabricated dry mortar.
sentences.chinese: 用于建筑墙体内外表面和顶棚装饰的预制干混砂浆。

sentences.english: The waved ceiling creates a dramatic visual expression within the hall.
sentences.chinese: 如波浪起伏的竹顶棚，构筑了大厅里戏剧般的场景。

sentences.english: Suggests to develop lower power output for single electric radiant heating panel applied in ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 建议开发单片功率较小的电热膜用于顶棚敷设。

sentences.english: Construction personnel said, pointing to now equipment good roof.
sentences.chinese: 施工人员指着现已设备好的顶棚说。

sentences.english: There is no sun in the grandstand. It's completely covered.
sentences.chinese: 正面看台没有太阳，是有顶棚的。

sentences.english: Funnel shall be installed above the engine casing.
sentences.chinese: 烟筒应该安装在机舱顶棚上。

definition: floor/floor (ie. metal plate, concrete slab, wooden planking etc)
cover of lamp/lampshade/glass cover of oil lamp
